description: The user's current ToS state defines what action if any they will need to take to meet ToS requirements.

enum.name: MUST_AGREE_NOW
enum.description: The user must agree to the new ToS before they can use the service.

enum.name: MUST_AGREE_SOON
enum.description: The user currently has agreed to an older ToS and they will need to agree to the new ToS before new required date.

enum.name: UP_TO_DATE
enum.description: The user has agreed to the latest ToS so they are up-to-date
